Comment: Eight months after Turner's death, so his district's 800K constituents will go without representation in Congress for nearly half the term he was elected to. Also, it means eight months with the existing balance of power in the House, so eight more months of Democrats being basically frozen out of Congress. The odds that we'll still have a democracy by November are not 100%.
